channel.title: Programming Apple Itunes Myspace on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Programming Apple Itunes Myspace on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: itunes.. automagic updating of recent listened to songs
item.description: recently apple released a pretty good COM sdk for its itunes program. my friend ajc created some sample code that would post whatever song you are listening to currently to a webpage. I found this pretty cool. and quite handy. so I implement my own version and BAM. if you notice at the bottom of my page (below the del.ico.us links) I have a listing of the most recent 5 songs I have listened to.
